## launch.json Example

```json
{
  "version": "0.2.0",
  "configurations": [
    {
      "type": "flowmason",
      "request": "launch",
      "name": "Debug Pipeline",
      "pipeline": "${file}",
      "input": {
        "key": "value"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```
